Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: isInsideCoroutine
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Returns true if this property is called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: await(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine and resumes it on callback.

Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.name: delay(_:)
Structs/Coroutine.html#/s:14SwiftCorouti.abstract: Suspends a coroutine for a certain time. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Structs/Coroutine.html.name: Coroutine
Structs/Coroutine.html.abstract: Additional struct with utility methods to work with coroutines.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: scheduleTask(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Performs the task at the next possible opportunity.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: startCoroutine(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Start a new coroutine on the current scheduler.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: await(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Start a coroutine and await its result. Must be called inside other coroutine.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.name: coroutineFuture(_:)
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html#/s:14S.abstract: Starts a new coroutine and returns its future result.

Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html.name: CoroutineScheduler
Protocols/CoroutineScheduler.html.abstract: A protocol that defines how to execute a task.

Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.name: subscribeCoFuture()
Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.abstract: Attaches CoFuture as a subscriber and returns it. CoFuture will receive result only once.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: init(task:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Starts a new coroutine and initializes future with its result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: result
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Returns completed result or nil if this future has not been completed yet.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: isCanceled
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Returns true when the current future is canceled.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: await()
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Await for the result of this CoFuture without blocking the current thread. Must be called inside a coroutine.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: map(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When future is fulfilled, run the provided callback, which performs a synchronous computation and return transformed value.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: recover(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When future is in an error state, run the provided callback, which can recover from the error and return a new value.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: mapResult(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: When future is fulfilled, run the provided callback, which performs a synchronous computation and return transformed result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenComplete(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture has any result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenSuccess(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture has a success result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenFailure(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture has a failure result.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: whenCanceled(_:)
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Adds an observer callback that is called when the CoFuture is canceled.

Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.name: publisher()
Classes/CoFuture.html#/s:14SwiftCoroutin.abstract: Returns a publisher that emits result of this CoFuture.

Classes/CoFuture.html.name: CoFuture
Classes/CoFuture.html.abstract: Holder for a result that will be provided later.

Classes/CoPromise.html.name: CoPromise
Classes/CoPromise.html.abstract: A promise to provide a result later.
